T02D2649:298b-3: yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2649:298b-4: dang por sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02D2649:298b-5: sa phyogs der sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi bar snang la dmigs te ;
T02D2649:298b-6: de rnams la dang por mchod pa dang /
T02D2649:298b-7: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2649:298b-9: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2649:298b-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2649:298b-11: lam la gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2649:298b-12: de'i 'og tu bdag dang dngos po thams cad mi
T02D2649:298b-13: snang par byas shing sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du
T02D2649:298b-14: bsgom mo // aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2649:298b-15: de nas aom tsittam pra ti bya dham k'a ro mi /
T02D2649:298b-16: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis aa yongs su gyur pa
T02D2649:298b-17: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can bskyed par
T02D2649:298b-18: bya'o // de nas aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D2649:298b-19: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis de nyid spro bar bya'o //
T02D2649:298b-21: zhes bya bas h'um las byung ba nam mkha'i khams
T02D2649:298b-22: thams cad dang mnyam par gnas pa'i rdo rje bsams
T02D2649:298b-23: la / de nas rdo rje'i gzugs de las sangs
T02D2649:298b-24: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa dang
T02D2649:298b-25: la / / rdo rje dang zla ba yongs su
T02D2649:298b-26: gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2649:298b-27: la / / phyag gnyis pa / sku mdog dkar
T02D2649:298b-28: po rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams par sngags 'dis
T02D2649:298b-30: satva sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a ma ham /
T02D2649:298b-31: de'i 'og tu h'um las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bsams la /
T02D2649:298b-32: de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2649:298b-33: de'i lte bar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs padma'i steng du bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2649:298b-34: shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa /
T02D2649:298b-36: nub tu 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02D2649:298b-37: byang du don yod grub ba'o //
T02D2649:298b-38: shar lhor rdo rje sems ma /
T02D2649:298b-39: phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po /
T02D2649:298b-40: phyag g-yon pa dkur brten pa /
T02D2649:298b-42: phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:298b-43: lho nub tu rdo rje rin chen ma sku mdog
T02D2649:298b-44: ser ba phyag gnyis pa phyag g-yon pa dkur brten
T02D2649:298b-45: pa / phyag g-yas na rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:298b-46: nub byang du rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D2649:299a-1: pa phyag g-yon pa dkur brten pa /
T02D2649:299a-2: phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-3: byang shar du rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa phyag g-yon dkur brten pa /
T02D2649:299a-4: phyag g-yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-5: 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor
T02D2649:299a-6: phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rtsibs
T02D2649:299a-7: bcu drug la bsam par bya ste /
T02D2649:299a-8: de la rtsibs kyi dbus su thams cad kyang sna
T02D2649:299a-9: tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
T02D2649:299a-10: par bya'o // de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su
T02D2649:299a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog ljang gu g-yon pa
T02D2649:299a-13: phyag g-yas na rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bsnyod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-14: rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-15: rdo rje chags pa sku mdog nag po phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-16: rdo rje legs pa sku mdog margad lta bu /
T02D2649:299a-17: phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-18: rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi
T02D2649:299a-19: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur
T02D2649:299a-20: ba'i phreng ba 'ching ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-21: rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-22: rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo
T02D2649:299a-23: bsangs phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
T02D2649:299a-24: mtshan 'dzin pa'o // rdo rje bzhad pa sku mdog
T02D2649:299a-25: padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar po phyag gnyis kyis so'i
T02D2649:299a-26: phreng ba gnyi ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis
T02D2649:299a-27: mtshan 'dzin pa'o // bsnams pa'o // rdo rje chos
T02D2649:299a-28: sku mdog dmar skya phyag g-yon pas padma'i sdong bu
T02D2649:299a-29: 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas padma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'o
T02D2649:299a-30: mtshan 'dzin pa'o // bsnams pa'o // // rdo rje rnon po sku mdog gur kum gyi mdog can /
T02D2649:299a-31: phyag g-yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2649:299a-32: tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa phyag g-yas kyis
T02D2649:299a-34: rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2649:299a-35: rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yon
T02D2649:299a-36: pa na dung bsnams pa phyag g-yas pa lce'i phyag
T02D2649:299a-38: rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo
T02D2649:299a-39: rje rtse gsum bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog cing gar
T02D2649:299b-0: rdo rje srung ba sku mdog @299b ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o //
T02D2649:299b-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis
T02D2649:299b-2: kyis mche ba gnyis rang bzhin gyis thad kar bsnams
T02D2649:299b-3: nas gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pas bzhugs
T02D2649:299b-4: pa'o // rdo rje khu chur sku mdog dkar po
T02D2649:299b-5: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams pa dang ldan par
T02D2649:299b-6: pa'o // bsam mo // de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ho //
T02D2649:299b-7: ham zhes bya bas bdag nyid la bltas la /
T02D2649:299b-9: zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du ye shes sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la /
T02D2649:299b-10: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2649:299b-11: zhes bya ba 'dis snying gar bcug ste ;
T02D2649:299b-12: bdag dang mi gnyis pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom mo //
T02D2649:299b-13: de nas yi ge h'um las byung ba rdo rje
T02D2649:299b-14: 'od dang ldan pa'i tshul can gyi lce bsam mo
T02D2649:299b-15: // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2649:299b-16: lnga rnams kyi bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang cod
T02D2649:299b-19: rdo rje'i dbang la sogs pa rdo rje sems ma
T02D2649:299b-20: la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo
